videos.description: Anderson Varejao displays his best moves in the paint to score on Luke Kornet.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Varejao goes to work on Kornet in the paint) 2021/5/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Varejao goes to work on Kornet in the paint

videos.description: Aaron Nesmith races coast-to-coast for a thunderous throwdown to end the half.

videos.headline: Aaron Nesmith throws down emphatic breakaway slam

videos.description: Jayson Tatum drives through traffic and hits a heavily contested layup.

videos.description: Jayson Tatum goes head-to-head with Dean Wade and scores the layup, plus the foul.
